PARAGRAPH.STRING: , Prince de Benevente (February 2, 1754 – May 17, 1838) was a French diplomat.

worked successfully from the regime of Louis XVI, through the French Revolution and then under Napoleon I, Louis XVIII and Louis-Philippe. Known since the turn of the 19th century simply by the name Talleyrand,
is widely regarded as one of the most versatile and influential diplomats in European history.
